ygData.subject: Specialize Skill  (help)
ygData.msgSnippet: Like most of you at level 22 and beyond we have trained in Specialize. I have a few questions I m sure you may have the answers to. 1: How do we know if a
ygData.messageBody:
Like most of you at level 22 and beyond we have trained in Specialize.
I have a few questions I'm sure you may have the answers to.

1: How do we know if a particular CASTING has utilized the
Specializatioin Skill of that particular magic type (i.e. evocation,
abjuration) to see if we got a savings of mana useage?


2: My Skill in Evocation Specialization is at 51. I am level 24 now
and cannot put any training points into it. Is there something wrong
or can I not apply any more points until a later level or never?

Thanks for the support

- Ziff
